name: search
summary: Search for features by name or tag
description:
The search command finds features matching a text query. It searches the 'name' tag by default but can also search other tags.

Supports case-insensitive matching, partial matches, and regular expressions.

options.-t, --type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)

output:
List of matching features with:
- OSM ID and type
- Name and matched tag value
- Coordinates
- Key tags (amenity, highway, etc.)
